abstract:
This is an extract from Geoffrey P. Miller's The Corporate Law Background of the Necessary and Proper Clause, appearing in The Origins of the Necessary and Proper Clause (2010), citing Tillman's Why Our Next President May Keep His or Her Senate Seat: A Conjecture on the Constitutions Incompatibility Clause.
The citation to Tillman's article will also appears in Geoffrey P. Miller, The Corporate Law Background of the Necessary and Proper Clause, 79 GEO. WASH. L. REV. 1, 1 n.*, 2 n.4 (2010).
[December 1, 2010]
title: Extract from Geoffrey P. Miller's The Corporate Law Background of the Necessary and Proper Clause, appearing in The Origins of the Necessary and Proper Clause (2010) citing Tillman's Why Our Next President May Keep His or Her Senate Seat: A Conjecture on the Constitutions Incompatibility Clause
subject: law
